com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.provider

Interface ProviderMetadata

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CloudProviderMetadata, DatabaseServerProviderMetadata, ResourceProviderMetadata
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProviderMetadata, SimpleCloudProviderMetadata, SimpleDatabaseServerProviderMetadata, SimpleResourceProviderMetadata

    public interface ProviderMetadata
    Metadata about a provider.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDescription(LocalizationContext localizationContext)
      Returns a localized human-readable description of the provider.
      String getId()
      Returns the unique identifier of the provider within its scope.
      LocalizationContext getLocalizationContext(LocalizationContext parentContext)
      Returns a localization context for the provider with the specified parent context.
      String getName(LocalizationContext localizationContext)
      Returns the localized name of the provider, suitable for display in a drop-down menu of peer providers within the same scope.
      List<ConfigurationProperty> getProviderConfigurationProperties()
      Returns the list of configuration properties that can be given to configure the provider.
      ConfigurationValidator getProviderConfigurationValidator()
      Returns the configuration validator.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns the unique identifier of the provider within its scope.
        Returns:
        the unique identifier of the resource provider within its scope

      • getLocalizationContext

        LocalizationContext getLocalizationContext(LocalizationContext parentContext)
        Returns a localization context for the provider with the specified parent context.
        Parameters:
        parentContext - the parent localization context
        Returns:
        a localization context for the provider with the specified parent context

      • getName

        String getName(LocalizationContext localizationContext)
        Returns the localized name of the provider, suitable for display in a drop-down menu of peer providers within the same scope.
        Parameters:
        localizationContext - the localization context
        Returns:
        the name of the provider

      • getDescription

        String getDescription(LocalizationContext localizationContext)
        Returns a localized human-readable description of the provider.
        Parameters:
        localizationContext - the localization context
        Returns:
        a localized human-readable description of the provider

      • getProviderConfigurationProperties

        List<ConfigurationProperty> getProviderConfigurationProperties()
        Returns the list of configuration properties that can be given to configure the provider.
        Returns:
        the list of configuration properties that can be given to configure the provider

      • getProviderConfigurationValidator

        ConfigurationValidator getProviderConfigurationValidator()
        Returns the configuration validator. The validator should make a best-faith effort to identify configuration problems that will prevent successful provider initialization.
        Returns:
        the configuration validator
